rule_text: Attained_Age <= 78.5 AND Attained_Age > 69.5 AND Smoker_Status > 0.5 AND Attained_Age <= 74.5 AND Duration <= 35.5 AND Face_Amount_Band > 3.5

interpretation.risk: Mortality is 3.00x the population average (200.4% higher).
interpretation.model: Model is calibrated for this segment (A/E=0.98).
